[HEADING] Connect and Get to Know our Alumni
[HEADING] Connect and take the next step
Our institution is a springboard for you to develop your mindset and the skills to tackle tomorrow's challenges
Be part of a vibrant, cosmopolitan and talented student body, uncover new perspectives, and unleash your potential
Experience a truly global education at a forward-thinking institution that has rapidly risen to international prominence
With HKUST's rigorous MBA curriculum and world-class faculty, you’ll be fully prepared for the constantly evolving landscape of today’s business world. As an internationally minded research university engaging with topics ranging from environmental change to artificial intelligence, at HKUST you’ll be equipped with an innovative mindset and an entrepreneurial spirit. We will encourage you to be creative, open to change, and confident in taking risks.
HKUST MBA Programs aim to address the future of living, work and people, providing you with the knowledge and skills necessary to anticipate and shape the future of business. Become a change leader, make a lasting difference.
As a former FMCG market researcher, I have embarked on a transformative journey by joining the Full-time MBA Intake 2023 at HKUST. With a passion for venturing into the field of management consulting, I aim to expand my industry knowledge and embrace new challenges. I recognize that the HKUST MBA program will equip me with the necessary skills and experiences through engaging in overseas competitions and taking up leadership roles in clubs and organizations.
The Digital MBA draws in global leaders from various regions, allowing me to have the chance to engage with a wider array of senior professionals from different backgrounds, broadening my perspective and participating in cultural and intellectual exchanges.
The greatest investment you can make is in your education and self-development. When tasked with greater responsibilities back then, I felt a strong need to acquire skills, knowledge, perspectives, and connections that would complement and accelerate my career. HKUST’s close ties to industry, the vast variety of electives and exchange opportunities offered by the HKUST MBA program, its extensive alumni network, and the flexibility of the Part-time Weekly mode were all factors that drew me to the program.
Hong Kong is the ideal place to study for aspiring MBA students who recognize that understanding and building an Asia-centric network will create long-term opportunities in this dynamic region. We have a supportive alumni network, international faculty with experience in Asia as researchers, a flexible curriculum, and the benefits of collaborating with the broader HKUST university community, such as the entrepreneurship center. Our goal is to prepare students for the future of work.
Designed by world-class faculty, our cutting-edge MBA program is here to equip you with the latest business trends, in-demand know-how and the art of innovative leadership. Prepare to push the envelope in a dynamic learning environment where you’ll learn how to collaborate, innovate and expand yourself both professionally and personally.
The vibrant community of learners and innovators we cultivate is a catalyst for growth and boundless possibilities. With a variety of networking events, global programs, corporate partnerships and student-leadership opportunities, you’ll be able to learn from peers and experts from diverse backgrounds. You’ll also have the chance to develop the connections and experience that will help you innovate and lead change in the future.
What We Do and Who We Are
What drives world-class education? At HKUST MBA, it’s the faculty’s dedication to innovation and adapting to a technology-driven world.

The personality development, soft skills exercises, EPS courses for case presentations, as well as the career coaches and alumni network all together honed my skills and gave me valuable advice on how to plan my career and approach the next steps.
Organized the opening Sports Club and led Intro to Sailing experiences
Interned at Tink Labs in the strategy group
Took part in the Wharton Private Equity Leverage Buy-out Case Competition in New York
Made a career switch into technology and lead digital transformation FWD
The HKUST MBA equipped me with the essential academic foundation and a supportive cohort, facilitating my seamless transition into my chosen industry.
Initiated and participated in the Sport, Healthcare, Consulting and Finance Clubs
Built network and secured a placement with Citibank
Transitioned from consulting to financial services, joined Citibank as an Assistant Vice President.
I see an MBA as one of the most important investments in my life, and UST has offered me the best ROI I can ever imagine.
Participated in Roland Berger Global MBA Case Competition in Barcelona
Gained valuable industry experience through internships at Schneider Electric, Ageas Group, and Jebsen Group.
Exchange in Kellogg School of Management, Northwestern University
Land to Mercer Hong Kong as Associate Director
My time at the school shifted my mindset. The alumni network in Hong Kong was particularly beneficial, giving me a strong support system and valuable opportunities after graduation.
Took MBA courses ranging from machine learning to private equity, crisis management & consultation
Took part in Mentorship program to expand professional network in Hong Kong
Advanced his career to Head of Sustainability Strategy & Transformation at PwC
